entry.title: Deploying a Telegram Bot on Heroku to auto-post stoic quotes in a Telegram Channel

link.title: Deploying a Telegram Bot on Heroku to auto-post stoic quotes in a Telegram Channel

entry.summary: For the last few months I’ve been following @dailystoic and now, while doomscrolling, I get my daily stoic wisdom one-quote-at-a-time. More recently I read Marcus Aurelius’s “Meditations”. I can’t really say that @dailystoic was the reason for buying the book, since it’d been in my wishlist for a long time, but it certainly gave me a *daily reminder.

entry.title: My experience running a small programming group for almost a year

link.title: My experience running a small programming group for almost a year

entry.summary: In October last year, I attended a programming group meeting, held by our university IEEE Student Branch. Although at the time the group had been running for at least a year, there were some freshmen university students attending for the first (or second) time. There were slides and algorithms and code written in C++ and I noticed that these freshmen didn’t understand all those things.
